name: Artio: Coloring Puzzle Games
description:
Tired of identical ‘pixel art’ and ‘color by number’ games? Want to try something new?
Artio is a perfect mix of traditional coloring games and jigsaw puzzles. It’s not like anything you’ve ever played before!

Artio is an art puzzle where you have to put the right pieces together to create a delightful picture. And that’s not all!
After the puzzle is done, the picture comes to life! Each one tells its own story and makes you slow down and think. What at first seems like a starry night might end up being the bottom of the ocean. Try it yourself!

There are no time limits or levels to beat, just enjoyable and incredibly creative pictures that you have to piece together.

All paintings are hand-drawn with love by many talented artists, exclusively for Artio.
